bibl.title: Two Unpublished Homeric Papyri at Duke University
bibl.note: P. Oxy. IV, 753 descr. verso (= M.-P.3 772; LDAB 2043). Δ 364-372 (omitting 369) and 375-398 (omitting 394-395). II-III CE. On the recto, unpublished account.
